attributes.review: Coming from a creative background this whole aesthetic of this app is wrong. Why is it so ugly? The first time logging in I see a HUUUUUGE Cheeto lookin object... that was my first turn off. I have more to say but it’s rlly not worth saying. I hope this app gets deleted.
attributes.title: Aesthetic

attributes.review:
This app is horrific. When I went into the app there were a bunch of pictures of toes and I was disgusted. Then, the ✨ o r a n g e ✨ was saying a bunch of sexist and racist crap that made me want to throw up. Also, the app didn’t ask if I wanted toe pictures before I entered so that was disturbing. 

Yeah ❤️

This is by far the worst app out on apple store, along with google classroom ofcourse. I kept getting glitches & this annoying, racist, orange looking man kept popping up & would not leave me alone!!! it kept blowing up my phone!!
